## getCmsLinkTarget() function

Return the target attribute for the cms link

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getCmsLinkTarget(content?: Omit<CmsSlot, "data"> & {
    data?: {
        url?: string;
        newTab?: boolean;
    };
}): String;
```
